attributes.action: Stop aid to Israel to prevent war crimes in Gaza
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned,
Call upon;
The United Nations,
The European Parliament,
The president, senate and congress of the United States,
The prime minister and Government of the United Kingdom,
And governments of the world;
To condemn the ongoing military actions of the State of Israel in Gaza as war crimes, and further as acts of terrorism;
Therefore declare illegal for a period of one day the sending of funds, charitable donations or aid money (including military aid), from donor nations, individuals corporations or groups residing within the above nations, to the State of Israel, including recipients within Israel as amounting to unlawful funding of war crimes
And for the avoidance of doubt we call upon all parties to cease and desist in any and all acts of violence or warfare, with immediate effect.
We further call upon all parties to embrace and promote international Human Rights and to work towards peaceful co-existence based upon mutual respect.
